REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9574 reute r f BC-SNYDER-<SOI>-BUYS-STA 03-18 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SNYDER <SOI> BUYS STAKE IN CENERGY
TEXT.BODY: Snyder Oil Partners LP said it acquired 1.2 mln shares, or 12 pct, of Cenergy Corp. It said it is continuing to review its investment and has made no determination of its future course of action. Reuter
